entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 then becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
